name: Toggle
description: Composite export for Toggle and ToggleController.

use: you want a lightweight toggle built on the button component.
you need a shared toggle controller API.
avoid: a checkbox or switch is a better semantic fit.

examples.minimal:
Toggle(
  value: true,
  onChanged: (value) {},
  child: const Text('Notifications'),
)

theming: Inherits button theming from the control registry.
accessibility: Provide clear labels for on/off state.
